recipe_text: Quantity; 900; Prepare 900 grams of chicken legs| Measurement; 30; Measure out 30 grams of olive oil| Measurement; 5; Measure out 5 grams of smoked paprika| Measurement; 5; Measure out 5 grams of garlic powder| Measurement; 5; Measure out 5 grams of onion powder| Measurement; 5; Measure out 5 grams of salt| Measurement; 2; Measure out 2 grams of black pepper| Untimed; None; Preheat air fryer to 190 degrees C (375 degrees F)| Untimed; None; Pat chicken legs dry with paper towels| Untimed; None; In a bowl, toss chicken legs with olive oil, smoked paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and black pepper| Untimed; None; Arrange chicken legs in the air fryer basket in a single layer| Timed; 1800; Cook in the preheated air fryer for 30 minutes, flipping halfway through| Finish; None; Serve hot and enjoy!
title: Air Fryer Chicken Legs
